prompt: List all open incidents in Veracity Delhi with their alarm messages.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlAlarmMessage_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlStatus_FRK = 1 AND b.bldBuildingName_TXT = 'Veracity Delhi';

prompt: Show non-reactive incidents in Delhi with their unit names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, s.strName_TXT, u.untUnitName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK LEFT JOIN Unit_TBL u ON il.inlUnit_FRK = u.Unit_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmNonReactive_BLN = 1 AND s.strName_TXT = 'Delhi';

prompt: Find all Video Loss incidents with their status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE ic.incName_TXT = 'Video Loss';

prompt: Count the number of incidents by status.
completion: SELECT is.insName_TXT, COUNT(il.IncidentLog_PRK) AS incident_count FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK GROUP BY is.insName_TXT;

prompt: List all extra incidents with their location and building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlLocation_MEM, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE ic.incName_TXT = 'extra';

prompt: Show pending incidents in Delhi with their building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlStatus_FRK = 3 AND s.strName_TXT = 'Delhi';

prompt: Find incidents with priority 1 and their alarm messages.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlAlarmMessage_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il WHERE il.inlAlarmPriority_LNG = 1;

prompt: List all incidents in Rohini with their status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Unit_TBL u ON il.inlUnit_FRK = u.Unit_PRK JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE u.untUnitName_TXT = 'Rohini';

prompt: Show closed incidents with their incident details and building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlIncidentDetails_MEM, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlStatus_FRK = 2;

prompt: Find incidents that are on test and include their street names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, s.strName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmOnTest_BLN = 1;

prompt: List all incidents with their category, status, and building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, ic.incName_TXT, is.insName_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK;

prompt: Show incidents with latitude greater than 28.6 and their building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlLatitude_DEC > 28.6;

prompt: Find all extra incidents with their unit names and alarm messages.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlAlarmMessage_TXT, u.untUnitName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK LEFT JOIN Unit_TBL u ON il.inlUnit_FRK = u.Unit_PRK WHERE ic.incName_TXT = 'extra';

prompt: Count incidents by building.
completion: SELECT b.bldBuildingName_TXT, COUNT(il.IncidentLog_PRK) AS incident_count FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK GROUP BY b.bldBuildingName_TXT;

prompt: List incidents acknowledged after December 15, 2024, with their status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmAcknowledgedDateTime_DTM > '2024-12-15 00:00:00';

prompt: Show non-reactive incidents in Veracity Delhi with their street names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, s.strName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmNonReactive_BLN = 1 AND b.bldBuildingName_TXT = 'Veracity Delhi';

prompt: Find all incidents ordered by date with their category names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlDateTime_DTM, ic.incName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK ORDER BY il.inlDateTime_DTM;

prompt: List incidents in Delhi with their action taken and status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlActionTaken_MEM, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE s.strName_TXT = 'Delhi';

prompt: Show incidents with color priority set after December 16, 2024, and their building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlColourPrioritySetTime_DTM > '2024-12-16 00:00:00';

prompt: Find all Video Loss incidents with their unit and status names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, u.untUnitName_TXT, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK LEFT JOIN Unit_TBL u ON il.inlUnit_FRK = u.Unit_PRK JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE ic.incName_TXT = 'Video Loss';

prompt: List all open incidents in Veracity Delhi with their alarm messages.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlAlarmMessage_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlStatus_FRK = 1 AND b.bldBuildingName_TXT = 'Veracity Delhi';

prompt: Count the number of incidents by status.
completion: SELECT is.insName_TXT, COUNT(il.IncidentLog_PRK) AS incident_count FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK GROUP BY is.insName_TXT;

prompt: List incidents acknowledged after December 15, 2024, with their status.

prompt: Find all Video Loss incidents with their unit and status names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, u.untUnitName_TXT, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK LEFT JOIN Unit_TBL u ON il.inlUnit_FRK = u.Unit_PRK JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE ic.incName_TXT = 'Video Loss';

prompt: List all incidents with file number starting with 'INC-2025' and their building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlFileNo_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlFileNo_TXT LIKE 'INC-2025%';

prompt: Show open incidents in Rohini with their alarm messages.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlAlarmMessage_TXT, u.untUnitName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Unit_TBL u ON il.inlUnit_FRK = u.Unit_PRK WHERE il.inlStatus_FRK = 1 AND u.untUnitName_TXT = 'Rohini';

prompt: Find incidents with alarm type 1 and their status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE il.inlProAlarmType_FRK = 1;

prompt: Count the number of non-reactive incidents by category.
completion: SELECT ic.incName_TXT, COUNT(il.IncidentLog_PRK) AS incident_count FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmNonReactive_BLN = 1 GROUP BY ic.incName_TXT;

prompt: List all closed incidents in Delhi with their location.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlLocation_MEM, s.strName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK WHERE il.inlStatus_FRK = 2 AND s.strName_TXT = 'Delhi';

prompt: Show incidents with priority 2 or higher in Veracity Delhi.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmPriority_LNG <= 2 AND b.bldBuildingName_TXT = 'Veracity Delhi';

prompt: Find all extra incidents ordered by acknowledgment date.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlAlarmAcknowledgedDateTime_DTM FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK WHERE ic.incName_TXT = 'extra' ORDER BY il.inlAlarmAcknowledgedDateTime_DTM;

prompt: List incidents in Veracity Delhi with their action taken.

prompt: Show incidents that are not logged and include their status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmNonReactive_BLN = 2;

prompt: Find all incidents with longitude less than 77.2 and their building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlLongitude_DEC < 77.2;

prompt: List all Video Loss incidents with their incident details and unit names.

prompt: Show pending incidents with their category and building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, ic.incName_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlStatus_FRK = 3;

prompt: List all incidents in Rohini with their alarm messages and street names.

prompt: List incidents in Delhi ordered by priority with their status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlAlarmPriority_LNG, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE s.strName_TXT = 'Delhi' ORDER BY il.inlAlarmPriority_LNG;

prompt: Show incidents in Rohini with priority 2 and their building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Unit_TBL u ON il.inlUnit_FRK = u.Unit_PRK JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE u.untUnitName_TXT = 'Rohini' AND il.inlAlarmPriority_LNG = 2;
